body.name: Oganacell DERX Toner with Peptides and Aloe, Calms, Hydrates, Firms, Revitalizes, Alcohol-Free Anti-Aging Facial Essence for Dry or Dehydrated Skin, 5.07 fl.oz
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 1 hr 59 mins
$10.30 pickup Saturday, February 17. Order within 19 hrs 29 mins
features: DEEP HYDRATION - Achieve nourishing hydration with this alcohol-free toner that absorbs instantly into skin. Use in layers, such as the 7 skins method, to achieve optimal hydration. Ingredients like Triple Hyaluronic Acid and Ectoin deliver deep hydration to skin.

REVITALIZE YOUR SKIN - This watery toner includes 10,000ppm of Triple DERX Solution, a skin-rejuvenating blend of Copper Peptides, Argireline, Nonapeptide-1, and five Amino Acids. This anti-aging toner provides a total solution to wrinkles, sagging skin, loss of elasticity, and other factors of aging skin.
INTENSE SOOTHING - This soothing toner calms skin. Centella Asiatica and Aloe extract helpt to reduce redness and calm irritation.

MULTI-USE TONER - Use toner in the method that best serves your skin: 1. Use as a balancing toner after cleanser by soaking a cotton pad and wiping it across skin 2. Use hands to spread across face 3. Apply multiple times using 7 skins method 4. Soak cotton pads leave on areas in need of elasticity boost for 5 minutes
DERMATOLOGIST TESTED - Oganacell products are developed with dermatologists and clinically tested to be hypoallergenic, making it safe for sensitive skin.

What is DERX? DERX is Oganacell's signature blend of three peptides (Copper Peptides, Argireline, and Nonapeptides) and five amino acids for intensive anti-aging support. Why should I add peptides to my skincare routine? Studies have shown that peptides may stimulate collagen production, increase hydration, and have restorative properties for the skin. Can I use the DERX Toner every day? Yes. The DERX Toner is a non-astringent, alcohol-free, non-irritating toner that is suitable to use every day. All Oganacell products are clinically tested to be non-irritating and is suitable for daily use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For tighter & smoother skin
reviews.reviewText: This is the first Ogana Cell product that I am using but I am always interested in Korean beauty products. This toner comes in an elegant looking plastic bottle. This toner is rich in peptides. Peptides are amino acids that are the building blocks of certain proteins needed by the skin, like collagen and elastin. This toner is clear and you apply with a cotton pad. It feels soothing and makes my skin feels tighter and smooth.Thank you for reading this review. I hope that my comments will be helpful. 😉

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A pleasant toner.
reviews.reviewText: Ogana Cell's Heaven Water Toner comes in a tall bottle with a screw off lid. Under the lid is a small opening for dispensing the toner. You can shake out a quarter sized amount at a time.The toner itself is clear and has a pleasant floral scent. It is modestly scented so it doesn't overwhelm. The toner goes onto my face nicely. It absorbs well and leaves my skin glowing and with a nice even complexion. I use the toner before my serum and moisturizer.I have combination skin with large pores and this toner has helped reduce the appearance of my pores and reduced dryness. It has not caused any issues with skin irritation or rashes.All in all... great toner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Peppy peptides for that a.m. get up and go
reviews.reviewText: We’re new to “Peptide Water” and admittedly a pretty tough sell. We have three family members who use toner daily yet my lemon toner concoction using witch hazel is the one we all keep coming back to. As toners go, $73 it at the top of the price scale for luxury products yet Oganacell is a brand that impresses. It’s not cloying or abrasive. We don’t look to toners to do what conditioners can do better in terms of moisture and skin pampering. However, if you are curious, it’s pleasant and worthy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Toner with peptides
reviews.reviewText: This skin toner is the first one I ever came across that contains peptides. Peptides are very beneficial for the skin. After cleansing the skin, I apply toner and then finish off with serum and moisturizer. I combine this peptide toner with peptide rich serum and moisturizer. My skin loves it. I have no wrinkles and I am very strict when it comes to taking care of my face and neck. This toner due to its ingredients, is superior to any products what one can find in the store, over the counter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice, gentle toner. No redness or irritation.
reviews.reviewText: I like this “Heaven Water” a lot. I struggle with toners that irritate my skin. This is very calming and non-irritating. Has a light floral scent. Feels great on my skin. I use it under day and night creams and it seems to support and maintain hydration of my skin. It has a soothing effect on my skin tone that I really prize. Overall, impressive results for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Amount of Peptides
reviews.reviewText: While this OGANA CELL Peptide Concentrating Heaven Water is a bit pricey, you do get a really large bottle of this skin-nourishing product, so it should last you a while. It contains a high concentration of various peptides, which help one’s skin to rejuvenate and stimulate collagen growth. Paired with an exfoliation scrub, I find this Heaven Water soothing to the touch. I pat it onto my skin and let it absorb completely then layer my other skin care products on top of it without any trouble at all. Just knowing the peptides are at work, I’m content using this simple, barrier-forming, peptide-rich Heaven Water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2021
reviews.reviewText: It does calm my skin. My cheeks get red easily and also dry, though I have combination skin, and so they can irritate easily. This helps to calm and alleviate. Also smooths my skin and seems to have a healthy looking glow afterward. I really like the ingredients of it and how nice it feels and my skin looks with it. I feel pretty confident with long-term, consistent use there will be more results to come. The smell is nice and soft

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2021
reviews.reviewText: i was surprised by how much I loved this toner. I have extremely sensitive skin and this toner did not burn and sting my skin. I have been using this toner for 2 weeks and it has really helped my flaky skin heal. It smells and feels wonderful on the face. I have been using Shiseido for years and this is honestly on par in terms of quality. I honestly would buy this again. It is worth every penny. Highly recommended.
